modules.description: Provides functions to parse and generate IMAP4rev1 protocol messages, including handling tagged and untagged responses, command sequences, and literal data. Works with byte sequences, strings, and structured data representing IMAP elements like tags, commands, and status responses. Used to implement email client interactions, such as fetching message headers or managing mailboxes over network connections.

The module offers non-blocking, stateful operations for encoding/decoding IMAP4 protocol messages, including authentication (PLAIN, XOAUTH2), mailbox management (create, delete, select), and message handling (search, fetch, copy). It works with data structures like message sets, flags, MIME components, and extended features such as Gmail labels and CONDSTORE. Use cases include real-time email synchronization, session management, and efficient processing of large mailboxes with support for UID/sequence number variants.
